content: in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 36 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 7 single_crochet in back loop only of each single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 8 - 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 13 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet decrease around 1 single_crochet 29 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet 29 single_crochet round 15 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around 1 single_crochet 22 single_crochet round 16 single_crochet in each single_crochet 22 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round leave 24 tail to sew body to head fasten_off © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 2 - dilly the kitten arm make 2 with contrasting color cc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round fasten_off with mc round 1 - 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around 9 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease around 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round leave 12 tail to sew arm to body fasten_off ear make 2 with cc chain 4 round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 2 chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn round 2 insert hook into single_crochet and draw up a loop insert hook into next single_crochet and draw up a loop insert hook into last single_crochet and draw up a loop then yarn over and take off all loops a tight chain st should then be made to fasten the cluster fasten_off cc you should now have a triangular-shaped piece piece a fig 1 with mc round 1 4 single_crochet evenly up right side of piece a 2 single_crochet in peak of piece a 4 single_crochet evenly down left side of piece a 10 sts round 2 slip_stitch in 1st 4 single_crochet single_crochet & half_double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet & single_crochet in next single_crochet slip_stitch in last 4 single_crochet 12 sts fig 2 leave 12 tail to sew ear to head fasten_off muzzle with mc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 10 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each of next 3 single_crochet around 16 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2c in each of next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 20 single_crochet leave 18 tail to sew muzzle to head fasten_off tail with mc chain 14 making sure 1st 3 chs
